extendedInfo.description: If you experience difficulties with the theme, please email our support! We will get it working for you. There are currently bugs afflicting Jelly Bean devices. Until the GO devs release a fix, the only remedy is to send the themes directly to afflicted users.** Note this theme requires GO SMS Pro (Free on Android Market): http://bit.ly/tHqrr4Features* High quality, crisp graphics* Stark contrast for optimum visibility* Unique purple accents* Optional custom font!Install* Select done, return to GO SMS, menu, themes, and activate your new theme!Activate the font* Go into GO SMS settings, Appearance and Scan for Fonts.* Once finished, select the font "vaground [GO SMS Dark Purple Theme]" within the customization for Conversation List, Conversation and PopUp, and save to whatever you want.Enjoy!* Let us know what you think in the comments!Have questions?** As we are unable to respond to comments, feel free to get in touch with us through email, Facebook and TwitterFollow us for our latest themes!* Twitter (@aBbtdesigns): http://bit.ly/xqfEl1* Facebook (aBbtdesigns): http://on.fb.me/yO5ULmaBbtKeywords: colorful, black, skin, glossy, widget, gloss
